newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT-JP Morgan starts Glaxo.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-JP Morgan starts Glaxo.

text.p: Glaxo Wellcome Plc was rated "buy" at JP Morgan as analyst Mark Becker started coverage of the stock, the investment bank said on Thursday.
Becker said Glaxo had a strong product pipeline and an "unparalleled ability to exploit strong research and development and marketing capabilities".
